title: Paint surfaces - Data analysis with arrays FRQ

content.question: Complete method hasEnoughPaint. /** * Returns true if numGallons is enough to * paint all surfaces in surfaceArray and * returns false otherwise * Preconditions: numGallons > 0 * No elements of surfaceArray are null. * surfaceArray is not empty. * Postcondition: surfaceArray is unchanged. */ public boolean hasEnoughPaint(int numGallons)

frqParts.text: Complete method hasEnoughPaint. /** * Returns true if numGallons is enough to * paint all surfaces in surfaceArray and * returns false otherwise * Preconditions: numGallons > 0 * No elements of surfaceArray are null. * surfaceArray is not empty. * Postcondition: surfaceArray is unchanged. */ public boolean hasEnoughPaint(int numGallons)

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
